      • getStatus

        public Agent.Status getStatus()
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface Agent
        Returns:
        The current Agent.Status of the Agent. This returns a snapshot of the state that won't change. If used at a later time, the snapshot should be refreshed.

      • init

        protected void init(java.lang.String agentId)
        This method should always be called during activation of the agent. It sets the agentId and desiredParentId. This will also call the init(String) method, so that call is no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        agentId - The agentId that should be used by this Agent. This will be returned when the getStatus() is called.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when either the agentId or the desiredParentId is null or is an empty string.
